title: Why is the project more focused on the negative actions than the positive?
content:
We can't do everything to fix the problems since we have limited resources. But if we want to fix things given our limited resources, we believe in the following steps ordered by level of importance:

  1. Expose and stop the problems, the bad things
  2. Do not hinder the good
  3. Support and promote the good
